#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define max(a,b) a > b ? a : b
#define min(a,b) a < b ? a : b
#define ll long long int
#define pi pair<int,int>
#define pl pair<ll,ll>
using namespace std;

int imin(int a,int b)
{
	return a < b ? a : b;
}

int main()
{
	int testcases,n,m,i,j,val;
	cin>>testcases;
	while(testcases--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int a[n+1];
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
			cin>>a[i];
		
		cin>>m;
		int b[m+1];
		for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
			cin>>b[i];
		
		int dp[n+1][m+1];
		for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
			dp[i][0] = i;
			
		for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
			dp[0][i] = i;
		
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
			{
				val = (a[i] == b[j] ? 0 : 1);
				dp[i][j] = imin(dp[i-1][j-1] + val,imin(dp[i-1][j] + 1,dp[i][j-1] + 1));
			}
		}
		cout<<dp[n][m]<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
